divs: sighting detailsearly on three seperate mornings (7\1, 7\2 & 7\6 2008) unable to sleep i went outside in my backyard . while standing there facing south on the first night, i noticed a light changing colors and at first i thought it was just a star flickering. humidity may have been in the single digits that night and the other stars were barely twinkling. i watched for maybe 20 minutes and it kept flashing green, yellow and red but not moving. tired, i went inside and didn't give it much thought other than it was odd but probably could be explained. on the second night, awake at the same time again, i went out back to look in the same direction. there it was again and i watched again for 20 minutes before deciding to photograph it. i got my digital camera and tripod went back out and it was still there. i set it up with no flash and set the timer. the viewing screen on my camera is small and in the dark all i could do was point it in the general direction. luckily i got two shots with the object in them. when blown up the shots show the object and the other stars in the same area. this thing was not a star and appears to have an oval shape. the object did not leave it's location the whole time i viewed it during the first two sightings. around 2:15 am iwent inside to bed and it was still there. i write this on 7\6 @ the same time as my sightings on 7\1 & 7\2. this am it was it was there again! around two hands off the southern horizon in the same general area. it was flashing the same colors only this time it was moving east. blocked by trees and clouds i could only observe it for 60 seconds or less.
Summary: Observed object hovering in SW sky flashing green yellow and red lights along it's edge.
